name: Car Wash Idle
description:
Are you prepared to run the best car wash ever?

Rule your car wash and become the richest manager!

Start with a small car wash, and work on it to make it grow.

Improve your car wash and control every aspect of the business. Build surrounding facilities to bring more cars to your car wash, and offer them the most enjoyable experience. Extend car wash to increase the number of cars.

Build the best car wash empire! Run the most famous car wash in the world! Will you invest your money in improving the facilities of the car wash? Or will you increase the price to earn more money? Take important decisions to create the best car wash.

If you like management and idle games, you’ll enjoy Car Wash Idle. An easy-to-play game, but challenging game. Start with a small car wash and take important business decisions in order to grow your tycoon. Transform your small business into the best car wash in the world!


Features:
- Easy-to-play game for every player
- Different challenges to complete
- Amazing animations and great 3D graphics
- Several sites available.
- Take important business decisions.
